name: Battle Grid: Prologue
description:
Battle Grid: PROLOGUE


Harvesting a foreign planet’s resources comes with its dangers.
Build up your grid: defend, position and improve your units and weaponry.
Survive the increasing onslaught that the planet harvesting awakens.
For the corporation, you must destroy to survive.

GAMEPLAY

  • Survivors - Attempt to outlast 1000s of enemies over 20 minutes.
  • Auto-battler - Assemble a team of mechs, mixing and matching units and weapons to create game breaking synergies.
  • Roguelite - Runs are tough but you can unlock permanent upgrades for your grid and your mechs.

CONTENT

  • 🔒Corporate contracts - quests that give rewards that can be cashed in for grid upgrades.
  • 🔒 Corporate ladder - a game mode that adds new challenge modifiers to runs for added difficulty.
  • 🔒 Deck management - unlock, add and remove mechs and weapons from the deck.
  • 🔒 Compendium - see what items you have received throughout your career.
  • 🔒 Statistics - view past runs, and other stats.
  • 🔒 Other planets.
  • Grid upgrades - permanent upgrades that can be purchased using in game currency.
  • 10 unique enemies.
  • 3 unique bosses.
  • Thousands of different potential team combos.
  • 60+ unique weapons.
  • 60+ unique units.
  • 9+ unit synergies.
  • 12+ weapon synergies.
  • Original music.

Much more content will be available in the main game.
